login_subtitle: Login into NXT Web Wallet now

register_subtitle: Register to NXT Web Wallet now.
could_not_decrypt: We could not log you in with this information.
could_not_find_secretphrase: Your username and / or email doesn't exist, we could not find the secretphrase.
username_email_exists: This username or email already exists and cannot be used.
successfully_registered: Successfully registered your account. You can now login.
passwords_should_equal: Passwords should be the same in both fields
click_to_copy_account: Click to copy your account number
account_help_message: Communicate your account number to your interlocutor so they can send you NXT. It is perfectly safe to make your account number public.
no_transactions: No transactions yet. Make your first today!

qr_help_message: This QR code contains your account number. Use a QR scanning mobile app in order to access it.
